original_title: Kool & the Gang: Live from House of Blues
overview: The concert was filmed at the House of Blues in Chicago. Tracks: 1. Emergency 2. Hollywood Swinging 3. Jungle Boogie 4. Kool and the Gang 5. Breeze and Soul 6. Chocolate Buttermilk 7. Sea of Tranquility 8. Let the Music Take Your Mind 9. Wild and Peaceful 10. Open Sesame 11. Summer Madness 12. Ladies Night 13. Get Down on It 14. Celebration
title: Kool & the Gang: Live from House of Blues
